main event: A witness observed a white, circular light moving in the SW sky with a red flashing light on 22 July 1963.
interesting points: The object was stationary for 10 minutes before moving again,The witness described it as a moving aerial object that faded and flickered,The object emitted no sound despite appearing bright,The sighting was evaluated as an observation of the Star Antares,The witness believed it was brighter than the brightest stars.
sighted object: a white circular light with a red flashing light
witness description: male, 35 years old with no relevant special experience
